text: Hi everyone! I’m trying to find my way around creating modules for the _new_ drag and drop email editor. I’ve figured out a way to use the `<style>` tag with `data-hse-inline-css="true"` and it works great, and I’m wondering if there’s a similar way to inject styling into the `<head>` to be able to use media queries for specific case. I’m aware of the limitations of media queries in emails.
Thanks for the reply - in design manager I see this right hand panel when editing modules but it is not visible when editing templates
